title: Emre Can
snippet: Can played for Eintracht’s youth team for three years (2006 to 2009) before moving to Bayern Munich’s U17 team. title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: He began his senior career at Bayern Munich, playing mostly in the club's reserve side before his 2013 transfer to Bayer Leverkusen. A season later, he was signed by Premier League club Liverpool for £9.75 million where he made over 150 appearances across all tiers of competition and would ...

title: Emre Can - Borussia Dortmund
snippet: Can played for Eintracht’s youth team for three years (2006 to 2009) before moving to Bayern Munich’s U17 team. title: Emre Can: Who is the Borussia Dortmund and Germany all-action midfielder? | Bundesliga
snippet: After a season in the Regionalliga with Bayern's reserves, Can made his full first-team debut for the Reds in the 2012 Supercup, playing 70 minutes at left-back in a 2-1 victory against his current club Dortmund.

title: Emre Can facts for kids
snippet: He usually plays as a central midfielder, but he can also play as a defensive midfielder, centre-back, or full-back. He started his senior career at Bayern Munich. He mostly played for their reserve team before moving to Bayer Leverkusen in 2013.
